NAME: ACCOUNT SECURITY
INCLUDES: ACCOUNT SECURITY, ANTI-FRAUD, DETECT MALWARE, VERIFY ACTIVITY, VERIFY IDENTITY

NAME: ADVERTISING
INCLUDES: IMPROVE ADS, MEASURE AD PERFORMANCE, PERSONALIZE ADS, PROVIDE ADS, SPONSORED CONTENT, THIRD PARTY ADVERTISING

NAME: ANALYTICS
INCLUDES: ALGORITHMS, MEASURE PERFORMANCE, PROCESSING SEARCH TERMS

NAME: COMPANY OPERATIONS
INCLUDES: AUDITING, CONNECT ACROSS PRODUCTS/DEVICES, CUSTOMER SERVICE, FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS, LEGAL COMPLIANCE, MAINTAIN PRODUCTS/SERVICES, TRACK OUTAGES

NAME: IMPROVE PRODUCT
INCLUDES: IMPROVE APPLICATIONS, IMPROVE CONTENT, IMPROVE PRODUCTS/SERVICES, IMPROVE STORES

NAME: LEARN USERS' BEHAVIOR
INCLUDES: LEARN FROM USERS, UNDERSTAND CUSTOMER BEHAVIOR

NAME: OTHER
INCLUDES: OTHER ADVERTISING, OTHER ANALYTICS/DATA ANALYSIS, OTHER LOCATION-BASED SERVICES, OTHER INTERNAL PURPOSES, OTHER OPERATIONS, OTHER BUSINESS SERVICES, OTHER RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT, OTHER SAFETY AND SECURITY

NAME: PRODUCT SAFETY
INCLUDES: DETECT SUSPICIOUS CONTENT, DETECT/PREVENT SPAM, INVESTIGATE VIOLATIONS, LOSS PREVENTION, NETWORK SECURITY, PREVENT HARM, PROTECT SERVICES, PROTECT USERS/PUBLIC

NAME: PROVIDE SERVICES
INCLUDES: APPLICATIONS, PROVIDE CONTENT, PROVIDE FEATURES, PROVIDE PRODUCTS, PROVIDE SEARCH RESULTS, PROVIDE SERVICES, PURCHASES, SUGGESTIONS/RECOMMENDATIONS

NAME: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT
INCLUDES: NEW PRODUCTS/SERVICES, RESEARCH AND INNOVATE FOR SOCIAL GOOD, SURVEYS, TECHNOLOGICAL ADVANCEMENT, TEST PRODUCTS/SERVICES

NAME: THIRD PARTY
INCLUDES: ADVERTISERS, AFFILIATED BUSINESSES AND PARTNERS, APIS, THIRD PARTY APPLICATIONS, CONTENT CREATORS, DATA PROVIDERS, DOMAIN ADMINISTRATORS, GOVERNMENT AND LAW ENFORCEMENT, MEASUREMENT PARTNERS, MERCHANTS/VENDORS, NEW OWNER, REGULATORS, RESEARCHERS/ACADEMICS, SERVICE PROVIDERS/CARRIERS, WEBSITES

NAME: APP INFO
INCLUDES: USE OF OTHER APPLICATION, APP NAMES, APP TYPES

NAME: BEHAVIOR ON DEVICE
INCLUDES: BEHAVIORS ON DEVICE, BROWSER DATA, REFERRER URL, SESSION INFORMATION, WINDOW PLACEMENT, OTHER DEVICE USE

NAME: CALL/MESSAGE LOG
INCLUDES: CALLING PARTY NUMBER, RECEIVING PARTY NUMBER, FORWARDING NUMBERS, TIME OF CALLS, DATE OF CALLS, TIME OF MESSAGES, DATE OF MESSAGES, DURATION OF CALLS, ROUTING INFORMATION, TYPES OF CALLS

NAME: DEVICE IDENTIFIERS
INCLUDES: APP IDS, DEVICE IDS , FAMILY DEVICE IDS

NAME: DEVICE INFO
INCLUDES: BATTERY LEVEL, DEVICE TYPE (PHONE, COMPUTER) , HARDWARE VERSION, OPERATING PLATFORM/SYSTEM, OTHER DEVICE INFORMATION, SOFTWARE VERSIONS, SYSTEM ACTIVITY

NAME: DEVICE SIGNALS
INCLUDES: BLUETOOTH SIGNALS, SIGNAL STRENGTH, WI-FI SIGNAL

NAME: FILE INFO
INCLUDES: FILE NAMES, FILE TYPES, STORAGE SPACE

NAME: NETWORK INFO
INCLUDES: COOKIES AND COOKIE DATA, DOWNLOAD & CRASH ERRORS, PAGE RESPONSE TIMES, CONNECTION SPEED, DEVICE NETWORK, NEARBY DEVICES, WI-FI ACCESS POINT DATA

NAME: NON-PERSONAL DATA
INCLUDES: CONTACT PREFERENCES, INFORMATION ABOUT OTHER USERS OF YOUR ACCOUNT, INFORMATION ABOUT THIRD PARTIES YOU INTERACT WITH, POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS, CUSTOMER LISTS

NAME: PRODUCT USE
INCLUDES: ACTIVE STATUS (CURRENT, LAST USE), AD INTERACTIONS/VIEWS, CONTENT CREATED, CONTENT INTERACTIONS, INTERACTION WITH OTHER USERS OF THE PRODUCTS AND SERVICE , PRODUCT USE (GOOGLE, APPLE, AMAZON, FACEBOOK), PRODUCTS VIEWED, EMAILS SENT/RECEIVED, BROWSING HISTORY, CLICKS/TAPS , FEATURES USE

NAME: USER'S CONTACT INFORMATION
INCLUDES: E-MAIL ADDRESS, HOME ADDRESS, PHONE NUMBER, SHIPPING ADDRESS
